name: PISTOLSHRIMPVSNINJASHRIMPGO
description:
THIS IS A GAME FOR BARFCADE WE HAD FUN MAKING IT WE HOPE YOU HAVE FUNPLAYING ITITS ABOUT SHRIMP BARFPUNCHING

THESE ARE REAL SHRIMP





controls are:
Player 1 Pistol Shrimp- wasd for movement, and space to shoot

Player 2 Ninja Shrimp - arrow keys for movement, and enter to dash attack

Pistols shrimp must survive for 30 seconds to win. If Ninja shrimp kills Pistol Shrimp before that 30 seconds is up, then he wins.

design/art: David French
code: Paul Gasca
audio: Jacob Getz
